title: dstatus.rs
description: Custom Discord Rich Presence daemon with GUI and TUI configuration. Features automatic reloading, template system, custom buttons, and cross-platform desktop app built with Rust and Tauri.

title: Based Online Stopwatch
description: Free, comprehensive online timer toolkit with no ads or premium paywalls. Features stopwatch, countdown timer, race timers, classroom tools, and random generators. Supports 12 languages and works offline.
